cmp: 曾 ((refers to something that happened previously)/already/at some time in the past/before/once, (surname)/great-grand (father))
mng: to give as a present, to repel, to bestow an honorary title after death (old)

exm.mng: to contribute (as a gift), to donate, benefaction
to favor, to gift, to grant, to bequeath, to bestow
to receive, to be given, to be presented with
to give a present, to accord (a favor), to grant
to give to the departed, to confer (a title) posthumously
